Header: Can money change the decisions of MPs on the No-Confidence Motion?
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Questions were posed to the General Public through People’s Power online on whether money can change the decision of MPs on the no-confidence motion? By 7 p.m. yesterday (April 2), the poll suggested that 75% of the people believe money will alter the decision while 25% said it will not. To participate in the poll please click the link below: https://goo.gl/YiyCvK
